semantic_description: Add or enhance RabbitMQ client instrumentation so that Jaeger spans for publish and consume operations include standard OpenTelemetry messaging attributes.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the queue name variable used when publishing or consuming

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the routing key variable in scope

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' or 'receive' depending on context
